newsitem.title: USA: PC Quote names new chief financial officer.
newsitem.headline: PC Quote names new chief financial officer.

text.p: PC Quote Inc, which provides on-line stock and market quotes, said Monday John Juska was named chief financial officer, effective immediatelly.
Juska had held several positions at the Chicago Mercantile Exchange, including vice president and chief financial officer.
PC Quote said Juska replaces Michael Press, who resigned as chief financial officer on July 15.
"John Juska brings two decades of diverse financial, operational and administrative management experience with him to PC Quote," Jim Porter, chief executive officer, said in a statement.
Last week, PC Quote said its accounting firm of McGladrey & Pullen LLP declined to stand for re-election as the auditor for the company.
PC Quote said in early April that its auditors had raised doubts about the company's ability to continue as a going concern because of significant operating losses.
In February, PC Quote hired investment bank William Blair & Co to help the company explore a possible sale, merger, joint venture or other business options.
